class.name: BlipKitWaveform
class.brief_description: Defines a custom waveform consisting of amplitude values.
class.description:
[codeblocks] [gdscript] var aah := BlipKitWaveform.new() aah.set_frames_normalized([-255, -163, -154, -100, 45, 127, 9, -163, -163, -27, 63, 72, 63, 9, -100, -154, -127, -91, -91, -91, -91, -127, -154, -100, 45, 127, 9, -163, -163, 9, 127, 45])
var track := BlipKitTrack.new() track.custom_waveform = aah track.note = BlipKitTrack.NOTE_G_4 [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: create_with_frames
method.description: Creates a waveform with the given [param frames]. The values are clamped between [code]-1.0[/code] and [code]+1.0[/code]. If [param normalize] is [code]true[/code], the values are normalized between negative and positive [param amplitude]. [param amplitude] is clamped between [code]0.0[/code] and [code]1.0[/code].

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Checks if the number of frames is at least [code]2[/code].

method.name: set_frames_normalized
method.description: Set the waveform's values and normalize the values between negative and positive [param amplitude]. [param amplitude] is clamped between [code]0.0[/code] and [code]1.0[/code].

method.name: size
method.description: Returns the number of frames in the waveform.

members.member: Set or get the waveform's values. The values are clamped between [code]-1.0[/code] and [code]+1.0[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] The number of frames must be between [code]2[/code] and [code]64[/code]. Fails if otherwise.
